Invited Talks

  14. Large mass bolometers for rare event searches: Brown Bag Instrumentation Seminar, Berkeley Lab, February, 2011

  16. Strange Quark Matter in lunar soil: Research Progress Meeting, Berkeley Lab, August 2009
